fields.title: dot product
fields.pointers:
* The dot product can be used to define  [matrix multiplication](matrix_multiplication) .
*  [Inner products](inner_product)  are generalizations of the dot product to other vector spaces. 
* The dot product is used to define the Euclidean vector norm, but there are  [other vector norms](vector_norms)  as well.
fields.summary: The dot product is an operation on vectors. It is used to define notions such as vector length, perpendicular vectors, and angles between vectors.
